document.full_text: plane maker boeing  said on sunday that high fuel prices and the social unrest in the middle east may have an impact on the orders it receives from the region in the short term.
document.title: boeing sees short term oil price, mideast impact
lines_and_colors: plane maker boeing  said on sunday that high fuel prices and the social unrest in the middle east may have an impact on the orders it receives from the region in the short term.
